summary: The Department of Veterans Affairs runs 300 Vet Centers nationwide that provide counseling services to military veterans and servicemembers. We previously reported on how VA assesses Vet Center counselors’ productivity. In this Q&A, we looked at VA’s staff survey on how productivity expectations may have affected care. We found that some parts of the survey were unclear, such as a question that didn’t specify whether...
title: VA Vet Centers: Opportunities to Improve Survey of Counselor Productivity Expectations
